meanings.definition: A person who steers a ship or boat.
meanings.sent1: The steersmen guided the ship safely through the stormy seas.
meanings.sent2: The experienced steersmen navigated the vessel with skill.
meanings.sent3: The steersmen joked about having a compass in one hand and a steering wheel in the other.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean of life, we are all steersmen of our own destinies.
meanings.sent5: The steersmen's steady hands kept the ship on course towards the horizon.
